fields.Chapter Title: <span style="font-size:12pt;">Failing Up: The Art of Choosing a Career Without a Plan (But With Plenty of Laughs).  </span>
fields.Book Title: Teach Counseling with a Sense of Humor: Why (and How to) Be a Funnier and More Effective Counseling Educator and Laugh All the Way to Your Institution.
fields.Description/Abstract: Though career planning is great, there are unplanned career choice approaches that might work.  Being available to potential career experts and employers increases the chance that some random fish in the lake may bite.  Being aware of what you can learn from a wide variety of personal experiences can spark career ideas.
